analysis.description:
BlabsCoin.claim (/unique_chucks/24/0xd1e67abc37762cef055fe4e5598036e23ec45cab.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/24/0xd1e67abc37762cef055fe4e5598036e23ec45cab.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xd1e67abc37762cef055fe4e5598036e23ec45cab.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/24/0xd1e67abc37762cef055fe4e5598036e23ec45cab.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/24/0xd1e67abc37762cef055fe4e5598036e23ec45cab.sol#154-157) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xd1e67abc37762cef055fe4e5598036e23ec45cab.sol#136) is not in mixedCase
